abstract: Lady Chablis, popular transgender entertainer featured in Savannah, Georgia, based novel and film adaptation of Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil, dies at age 59.

headline.print_headline: The Lady Chablis, 59, Performer Featured in Book and Film
headline.main: The Lady Chablis, Sassy Eccentric in ‘Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil,’ Dies at 59

keywords.value: Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil (Movie)
keywords.name: creative_works

keywords.value: Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

snippet: Ms. Chablis was a standout character in the book and movie that introduced the world to Savannah, Ga., and the sometimes unconventional people who live there....
lead_paragraph: Ms. Chablis was a standout character in the book and movie that introduced the world to Savannah, Ga., and the sometimes unconventional people who live there.
